comment.author: 89231549@N00
comment._content: The map placement is inaccurate. This was taken from at least a block north of the Buckingham Fountain (which would be at Van Buren), looking south on Lake Shore Drive. The map places the photo at McCormick Place, part of which is visible in the background, a number of blocks south of the Field Museum.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi Mikey Brick,

Thanks for your help with the map placement!  I've changed the location of the photo on the map based on your suggestions.

Mary
U.S. National Archives

comment.author: 89231549@N00
comment._content: You're welcome, Mary. Though now it's a block west of Lake Shore Drive on Columbus on the map.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Whoops!  I think we've finally got it this time.  Thanks again!
